artist: Designer: Sewell Sillman; Mill: N/E; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: White plain weave polyester cotton cloth with white supplementary warp. Topographical pattern of wavy transparent lines formed by open plain weave areas with increasing density towards the center of the fabric.
